SCTX - Script Source:
scn fbmwBMWerewolfEquip


ref ActorRef
Begin Function {ActorRef}
	if(ActorRef == Player)
		ActorRef.AddItemNS fbmwWereBodyPC 1
		ActorRef.EquipItemSilent fbmwWereBodyPC
		ActorRef.AddItemNS fbmwWereHeadPC 1
		ActorRef.EquipItemSilent fbmwWereHeadPC
		ActorRef.AddItemNS fbmwbmwerewolfclawPC 1
		ActorRef.EquipItemSilent fbmwbmwerewolfclawPC
		ActorRef.AddItemNS fbmwbmWerewolfClawShieldPC 1
		ActorRef.EquipItemSilent fbmwbmWerewolfClawShieldPC
		ActorRef.AddSpellNS 0werewolfSregeneration
		ActorRef.AddSpellNS 0werewolfSresists
		ActorRef.SetFactionRank fbmwWereFaction 0
	else
		ActorRef.AddItemNS fbmwWereBodyNPC 1
		ActorRef.EquipItemSilent fbmwWereBodyNPC
		ActorRef.AddItemNS fbmwWereHeadNPC 1
		ActorRef.EquipItemSilent fbmwWereHeadNPC
		ActorRef.AddItemNS fbmwbmwerewolfclaw 1
		ActorRef.EquipItemSilent fbmwbmwerewolfclaw
		ActorRef.AddItemNS fbmwbmWerewolfClawShield 1
		ActorRef.EquipItemSilent fbmwbmWerewolfClawShield
		ActorRef.AddSpellNS 0werewolfSregeneration
		ActorRef.AddSpellNS 0werewolfSresists
		ActorRef.SetFactionRank fbmwWereFaction 0
	endif		
End
;<CSEBlock>
;<CSECaretPos> 859 </CSECaretPos>
;</CSEBlock>
